name: Timing Blocks
description:
Timing Blocks is a logic puzzle game suitable for PC, with simple operation and relaxed atmosphere. You can freely match your choices and control small block to reach the finish line.
2D graphics, logical reasoning, highly challenging puzzles, enjoy the process of solving problems

Gameplay Introduction

By controlling the up, down, left, right arrows or WSAD keys to control your block, the block will automatically choose the planned route to move and avoid obstacles, in order to ultimately reach the finish line and achieve ultimate victory
